to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: It is worth noting that the monohydrate is not mentioned in the literature.
sentences.chinese: 值得指出的是，在本文獻中沒有提到一水化物。

sentences.english: The stuff in the sugar bowl. We’re not talking about complex carbohydrates, which are merely long strings of sugars.
sentences.chinese: 我們不討論碳水化合物，那是一長串糖的合成物。

sentences.english: In theory, it takes only 12kg of water to hydrate a completely sack of cement.
sentences.chinese: 從理論上說，使一袋水泥完全水化只需要12kg水。

sentences.english: The hydration mechanism of matrix materials adulterated admixtures was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討了摻入外加劑後基體材料的水化機理。

sentences.english: Choose foods that are low-fat but have a high carbohydrate content.
sentences.chinese: 選擇低脂肪，但具有較高的碳水化合物含量的食物。

sentences.english: Find articles "and" products to "other" products, a leading low-carb.
sentences.chinese: 查找文章和產品名單其他頂尖低碳水化合物產品。

sentences.english: Number one, you get hypoglycemic from the lack of carbs.
sentences.chinese: 排名第一的，你就會得到降糖缺乏碳水化合物。

sentences.english: There was significant difference in the carbohydrate contents of G.
sentences.chinese: 光強和光質對碳水化合物含量有顯著影響。

sentences.english: Eating carb in moderation doesnot directly leat to weight gain.
sentences.chinese: 食糧攝入碳水化合物不會直接導致體重增加。

sentences.english: The glycemic index applies to carbohydrate-containing foods.
sentences.chinese: 胰島素指數適用於含碳水化合物的食物。

sentences.english: In addition, ettringite is the main hydration product in the ITZ.
sentences.chinese: ITZ中的主要水化產物是水化硫鋁酸鈣。

sentences.english: Before transplantation, the graft is thawed and rehydrated.
sentences.chinese: 移植前，移植物的解凍和再水化。

sentences.english: Objective To study the rehydration therapy method to treat hyperosmolar nonketotic diabetic coma .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討非酮症高滲性糖尿病昏迷的水化療法。

sentences.english: It is impossible to rehydrate a mucus globule once it has become dehydrated.
sentences.chinese: 一旦已經脫水，粘液不可能再水化。

sentences.english: One way to get carbs on the run is through sports drinks.
sentences.chinese: 一個得到碳水化合物的方法是通過運動飲料。

sentences.english: Carbo loading is used by endurance athletes just before competing.
sentences.chinese: 耐力型運動員在比賽馬上開始之前來補充碳水化合物。

definition: to spread out after being diluted or melted/to dissolve into a liquid
